item.description:
Re-invigorate and Re-inspire Your Spiritual Self
Spiritual Seminars with
Mother Clare Watts

Master Teacher Mother Clare Watts is presenting three spiritual seminars at the Center of Light in New Haven. Learn to free yourself from fear.
Discover the joys of living single.
Reclaim your feminine spiritual power.
Register Now



Fear: Why We Are Afraid and the Path to Fearlessness
Thursday, January 27 • 7:30 pm
Suggested Donation: $25 - Bring a Friend for Free!

In a world of self confidence, clarity, and peacefulness how does fear creep in so easily? It is the seed of anger, confusion, and war. Fear creatively gets us to believe we are helpless, alone, powerless, and cut off. But when the truth comes in you know differently; come to this seminar and learn to fearlessly walk the way of freedom from all that has held you from becoming yourself.


Also this weekend:

The Joy of Being Single
Friday, January 28 • 7:30 pm
Suggested Donation: $25 - Bring a Friend for Free!


Women, Spirit, Healing, and Power
Saturday, January 29 • 10 am to 2:30 pm
Suggested Donation: $35 - Lunch Included - Bring a Friend for Free!
Please note: this seminar is for WOMEN ONLY.

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Seminar: Fear: Why We Are Afraid and the Path to Fearlessness
